price: To, a lõkacin da masihirta suka jẽ suka ce wa Fir'auna,"Shin, lalle ne, haƙĩƙa munã da ijãra idan mun kasance mũ ne marinjãya?"
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُواْ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qālū lifir'ʿawna a-inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
